content: अभिहृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To carry or bear off, snatch away, remove, take away. {@--2@} To tear off, pull down. {@--3@} To bring; bring near. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to take away. {@--2@} To bring on the table, serve up in dishes &c. (as food). {@--3@} To lay or put on (as a coat). {@--4@} To attack.
